doy
filter in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Simplified version of thirtyYearAvgDayOfYear that simply takes a number day of year and returns a formatted date. Default format is 'MMM d'.

This filter equates doy 0 with doy 1 since legend scales are inconsistent in this regard.

Usage

In HTML Template Binding

{{ doy_expression | doy }}

In JavaScript

$filter('doy')()
